course.title: ADM 2372 Management Information Systems (3 units)
course.desc: Introduction to management information systems, their underlying infrastructure and technology, and their impacts on organizations and individuals. Applications of information systems at the operational and decision making levels. Electronic business. Ethical and legal issues. Security and quality issues. Advanced topics including knowledge management and business intelligence.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: ADM 1370 or CSI 1306 or ITI 1120.
